parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Page token returned by previous call

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: A list of strings specifying the order of results. Supported order_by fields are id and name. The default is id asc. This field is optional.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Select a subset of results based on the specified criteria. The supported filters are:

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

get.description: Lists pipelines defined in the Delta Live Tables system.
